location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles du Lyall, Government of India to Colonel Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing sections of the Leave code pertaining to a particular situation of Pelly's and recommending that Pelly consult Mr Harrison for further advice.Enclosed with the letter are handwritten excerpts of the leave code covering sections eighteen, twenty-one and twenty-two.
